synopsis.text: Reform Club member Willy Fog, a punctual and meticulous Londoner, takes on an ambitious challenge: to circumnavigate the globe in just 80 days. With a 20,000 pound wager on the line, Willy embarks on his journey with his newly hired butler. However, their adventure is fraught with obstacles as they are pursued by two Scotland Yard inspectors who suspect Willy of a bank heist and a cunning wolf sent by a rival club member to sabotage their mission. Based on Jules Verne's classic novel, this thrilling series promises to captivate viewers with its lovable characters and exciting escapades.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
